channel.title: Buy 100 shop text option?
channel.description: Well i recently got tired of people on my server saying "sell me arrows or runes because it will take too long buy hitting buy 10 at the shops" so I fixed the by 10 option to make it buy 100 everytime you hit it. The problem is when u want to buy something at the shops it still says Buy 10 as an option. How do I fix it to say Buy 100?

item.title: Buy 100 shop text option?
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
